queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{argocd-server}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=argocd-application-controller.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=argocd-application-controller.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=argocd-application-controller.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=argocd-application-controller.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-application-controller}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-server}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: create, get, list, watch, update, patch, delete) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dex}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.readinessProbe should be defined

metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{copyutil}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-repo-server has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=dex has resources defined

spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-repo-server should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=dex should have resources defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{redis}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-redis}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{redis}}

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{dex}}

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-repo-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{argocd-repo-server}}

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{argocd-dex-server}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-repo-server does not have a security context

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=redis does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-application-controller has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-application-controller does not have a security context

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=copyutil does not have a security context

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=dex does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-server has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=argocd-server does not have a security context
